

// James Gregory atan series
// atan x = x - x^3/3 + x^5/5 - x^7/7 + ...

!!term(x,n) = ((x^(4*n-3) / (4*n-3)) - (x^(4*n-1) / (4*n-1)))


RENDER pi = 20 * atan (1 / 7) + 8 * atan (3 / 79)
RENDER "Arc Tangent series of Leonhard Euler" TOP
one7 = 1/7; three79 = 3/79


!!term17(n)  = term(one7,n)
!!term379(n) = term(three79,n)
!!termn(n)   = term17(n)*20 + term379(n)*8


approximationOfPI = SIGMA [1 <= i <= 15] ( termn(i) )
